title: Hype Officially Begins For Mayweather-Pacquiano Fight
teaser: There was fear in the boxing world that this generation's two best fighters would retire before facing each other in the ring. But the Floyd Mayweather, Jr. and Manny Pacquiao fight is on for May 2.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
